channel.title: [pi] hand cannon does not have spec
channel.description: well im new to servers and i've tryed so many things to try getting a hand cannon a spec but the spec bar isnt there and there is no spec atm so can anyone help?

item.title: [pi] hand cannon does not have spec
item.dc:creator: @vovik vovik
item.description:
@vovik wrote:

go to combatassistant.java find public boolean checkSpecAmount(int weapon) {
you should see something like this public boolean checkSpecAmount(int weapon) { switch(weapon) { case 1249: case 1215: case 1231: case 5680: case 5698: case 1305: case 1434: case 15006:

just add another line case itemid:

than go to itemassistant.java serach for

u should see something like this

case 1215:// dragon dagger case 1231: case 15006: case 10887: case 5680: case 15007: case 5698: case 1305: // dragon long case 11694: case 11698: case 11700: case 11730: case 11696:
just do the same as before

Read full topic
